properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 3:06PM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rain this evening is expected to transition to freezing
rain overnight into early Saturday morning with ice accumulation
of up to one quarter of an inch. Mixed precipitation continues
Saturday before transitioning to all snow Saturday evening
through Saturday night. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7
inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Iosco, Gladwin and Arenac Counties.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel is expected to become very difficult. Isolated
power outages are possible due to the combination of ice and
gusty winds.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
